# About Me
I am Sridhar, a passionate developer proficient in various AI tools and technologies, including NLP, ML, DL, TensorFlow, NumPy, and more. Alongside my expertise in AI, I also have knowledge of web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) and backend technologies (Azure, MongoDB).
